# Web Framework
fastapi
uvicorn[standard]

# File Upload & Processing
python-multipart

# OCR Dependencies
pdf2image
Pillow
opencv-python
easyocr

# ML & Embeddings
sentence-transformers
faiss-cpu
numpy
pandas

# LLM Integration
langchain
langchain-google-genai
google-generativeai

# Data Validation
pydantic
time

# Environment Management
python-dotenv

# Optional for production
gunicorn
